body_html:
@aaroey Thank you so much for the clarification. In theory, as our current system is set up in a SIMD-like way, what we are doing quite possibly is fine, but I understand that that is by accident rather than design and that there may well be side-effects which at some point will bite us. It also sounds as if we would be best-advised to rework our code to behave in a supported way.

You have definitely given me enough to go on in terms of things to try and changes that will definitely work.

Thanks again for your time and patience!
